# Total World Exports (US$ Trillion), by Product Classification
## Streamgraph

```{r, out.width="60%", fig.align="center", fig.cap="Photo by Paul Teysen on Unsplash"}

masthead <- "assets/paul-teysen-unsplash.jpg"
knitr::include_graphics(masthead, dpi=72)

```

***

# Ingest
## year, product, and value

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df = read.csv("./archetypes/world-exports/total-world-exports-by-product-classification-summary.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Wrangle
#### value transform


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide'}

df$Value <- df$Value / 1000000000
df

```


### Plot
#### color by product type


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

# Standard theme options to use for each view
theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "bottom",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text.y = element_blank(),
  axis.line.y = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  # panel.grid = element_blank(),
  # panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
)

# "Animal"
# "Capital goods"
# "Chemicals"
# "Consumer goods"
# "Food Products"
# "Footwear"
# "Fuels"
# "Hides and Skins"
# "Intermediate goods"
# "Mach and Elec"
# "Metals"
# "Minerals"
# "Miscellaneous"
# "Plastic or Rubber"
# "Raw materials"
# "Stone and Glass"
# "Textiles and Clothing"
# "Transportation"
# "Vegetable"
# "Wood"

v1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = Year, y = Value, group = Product, fill = Product)) +
  stat_steamgraph() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1988, 1990, 1992, 1994, 1996, 1998, 2000, 2002, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2014, 2016)) +
  scale_fill_tableau(palette = "Tableau 20") + # Classic 20, Tableau 20
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL)

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

v2 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = Year, y = Value, group = Product, fill = Product)) +
  geom_stream(lwd = 0.25, n_grid = 100) +
  geom_stream_label(aes(label = Product)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1988, 1990, 1992, 1994, 1996, 1998, 2000, 2002, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2014, 2016)) +
  scale_fill_tableau(palette = "Tableau 20") + # Classic 20, Tableau 20
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL)

girafe(ggobj = v2, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```




```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-show'}

# eval = FALSE as default; run manually as chunk

# full version
ggsave(filename = "outputs/world-exports-fs.svg", plot = v1, width=1280/72, height=720/72)

# thumbnail version without annotations
ggsave(filename = "outputs/world-exports-sm.svg", plot = v1, width=4, height=2.25)

```
